channel.title: RuneBadX 24/7 Pro Coders much more
channel.description:
[img]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab142/owndknightscape/runebadX.jpg[/img] [size=24pt] [shadow=red,left][font=impact]RuneBadX were developers get paid[/font][/shadow][/size]
[size=14pt]Hello everyone, my name is theowned. I would like to bring forward to the community a new RSPS, RuneBadX.i'm the owner of RuneBadX,the server is 24/7,it is hosted by my own on a dedicated server the server will gonna be great the coders will do easy stuff and also hard stuff, whe have already 3 pro coders working, but whe have alot hard stuff to do by hard stuff i mean[/size] [center][size=14pt]Summoning construction Dungeenering hunter full screen all bosses[/size] [/center]
pics of the server: (the pics are from exion but these things are also in the server, couse the server is based on exion [PI]) [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac233/EvoScape/turm.jpg[/img] [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac233/EvoScape/x10.jpg[/img] [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac233/EvoScape/quickchat-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac233/EvoScape/prayer.jpg[/img] [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac233/EvoScape/intefcae-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac233/EvoScape/gwd-1.jpg[/img]
[center][size=14pt]what whe want to reach whit this awesome server[/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Perfect economy; -fully working summoning; -fully working construction; -fully working dungeenering(first ever); -custom quests. -all the minigames -all the new bosses[/size] [/center] [center]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][size=14pt]what do whe need
server Coders Webclient maker client coders beta testers[/size][/center]
if you want to work whit us fill in this and send it in a personal message:
[center][size=14pt]Name: Timezone: Job wanted: Any past experience? Why you chose RuneBadX [/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Positions At the moment: Owner: TheOwned co owner: --- Website designer:Mercifies gfx designer:--- head coder:(still not decided) coder:--- coder:--- coder:--- junior coder:--- junior coder:--- Advertisement: ---
maybe see you later in RuneBad X
why i make the fonts so big: couse little letters are boring to read:P[/size][/center]
need pro coders will pay!

[quote=“SunSpec221, post:9, topic:370493”][quote author=ritzlove link=topic=466596.msg3421531#msg3421531 date=1291549982]
hi man, i want to be a co-owner.
Name: hamza kaced
Timezone:+4:00 GMT(Abudhabi)
Job wanted:co-owner
Any past experience?
about me:i am experienced in all positions as i was ex-mod on frugooscape, suggested on ritzscape and corruptionx, mod in 7 server,admin on 5, and co on 2.

Why you chose RuneBadX

I chose RuneBadX because it seems as a great server with a bright future that I want to be part in.

if you’re intrested please PM me in thedudesrock@hotmail.com
[/quote]

Not to be rude, but this is probably leeched.[/quote]

i am not a leecher, and I really want this job so…

Read full topic
